Posts.Content: Jun 12, 2011 06:04AM MBusha wrote: I had savi brachytherapy.  If you are a candidate for this method of radiation I would highly reccommend it.  I had no side effects, the treatments were painless and the cath was not uncomfortable.  I was able to do most daily activities with no discomfort or fatigue.  Best of luck to you
Posts.Title: SAVI breast brachytherapy - 5 day ktab96 DebConway
